thread.title: Uncapped Berardi pulls out of Italy squad with injury
thread.title_full: Uncapped Berardi pulls out of Italy squad with injury

title: Uncapped Berardi pulls out of Italy squad with injury
text:
Uncapped Sassuolo forward Domenico Berardi pulls out of Italy squad with injury THE ASSOCIATED PRESS First Posted: October 05, 2015 - 2:09 pmLast Updated: October 05, 2015 - 2:09 pm We also have more stories about: (click the phrases to see a list) 
People: 
Italy (124) 

FLORENCE, Italy â€” Forward Domenico Berardi has pulled out of the Italy squad with an injury, two days after receiving his first senior international call-up for the upcoming European Champions qualifiers against Azerbaijan and Norway. 
The 21-year-old Berardi was named in the starting lineup for Sassuolo's Serie A match against Empoli but pulled up with a muscular injury in the warm-up and was replaced by Matteo Politano. 
Italy coach Antonio Conte says Berardi underwent tests and a scan on Monday and while "they showed nothing serious ... he told me he is in a lot of pain." 
Conte adds that Berardi "is also a bit scared because he's coming back from an injury, so he prefers to return home and recover." 
Conte will not call up a replacement. 
Italy is top of Group H, two points ahead of Norway.
